acceptance-test-run.title: Looking up the definition of a simple word
acceptance-test-run.name: Looking up the definition of a simple word

test-group.name: Given the user does not know the meaning of the word 'banana'
When the user looks up the definition of the word 'banana'
Then they should obtain a definition containing the words 'An elongated curved fruit'

test-step.description: Should see a definition containing: {An elongated curved fruit}
test-step.error: org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException: Timed out after 30 seconds.
